name: Orrimaarko (V)
Lore: 'Dresselian Scout and resistance leader. Worked tirelessly to combat the subjugation of his homeworld before Bothans brought him into contact with the Alliance.',
Text: 'Once per game, may take a rifle and/or an Interrupt with ''scout'' in game text into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Unless Undercover, while alone at an exterior site, opponent''s weapon destiny draws here are -2. Immune to attrition < 4.(Original concept by Jon Westergard - Virginia States 2005)',
